tool_description: This API returns ESPN Soccer data such as scores, team stats, leagues, match, players and much more
name: ESPN Football (Soccer)
title: ESPN Football (Soccer)

api_list.name: Schedule Team
api_list.description:
Get Schedule Team

Parameters:
teamId (* required)
season (Default: '2023')
league (Default: 'eng.1')

api_list.name: SOCCER Team Roster
api_list.description:
Get Roster

Parameters:
teamId (* required)
league (Default: 'eng.1')
season (Default: 2023)

api_list.name: SOCCER Injuries
Team Stats
api_list.description:
Get Team Statistic

Parameters:
playerId (* required)
season (Default: 2023)

api_list.name: Players Stats
api_list.description:
Get the Player Stats

Default: 
playerId (* required)
season (Default: 2023)

api_list.name: SOCCER Player Description
api_list.description:
Get Player Description

Parameters:
league (Default: 'uefa.champions' )
playerId (* required)

api_list.name: League Stats
api_list.description:
Get League Stats
Parameters:
league (Default: 'eng.1') If you want all use 'all' as a value.

api_list.name: SOCCER News
api_list.description:
Get News by League

Parameters:
league (Default: eng.1) If you want news for all leagues use 'all' as a value.
limit (Default: 20)

api_list.name: SOCCER Team Info
api_list.description:
Get Team Info

Parameters:
season (Default: 2024)
league (Default: 'eng.1')
teamId (* Required)

api_list.name: SOCCER Team List
api_list.description:
Get SOCCER Team List

Parameters:
limit (Default: 50)
season (Default: 2024)
league (Default: 'eng.1')

api_list.name: SOCCER Transfers
api_list.description:
Get Soccer Transfers

Parameters:
league (Default: all)
limit (Default: 20)
page (Default: 1)
year (* The year)
